function.name: save_file
function.description: Save the provided content to a file with the specified file path

content.description: The content to save to the file

file_path.description: The file path to save the content to

function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the content of the provided file path

file_path.description: The file path to read the content from

function.name: list_files
function.description: List the files in the workspace directory

function.name: web_search
function.description: Search the web for information on the provided query

query.description: The query to search the web for

function.name: coding
function.description: Start a coding session with the provided task description

task.description: The task description for the coding session

function.name: extract_tasks
function.description: Extract tasks from the given text

text.description: The text to extract tasks from

function.name: update_task_status
function.description: Update the status of a task

task_id.description: The ID of the task to update

status.description: The new status of the task

function.name: get_task_summary
function.description: Get a summary of all tasks
